MAST.ingredients.checker.vaspnebchecker module¶

class MAST.ingredients.checker.vaspnebchecker.VaspNEBChecker(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: MAST.ingredients.checker.vaspchecker.VaspChecker

VASP checker functions

get_energy_from_energy_file()[source]¶

Get the energy from the energy file. For VASP neb, this is the last E0 energy from each OSZICAR, and this function should be used if vasprun.xml is corrupted or not available. Args:

mydir <str>: Directory in which to look.
Returns:
<str>: all last E0 energies from OSZICAR files.
get_path_to_write_neb_parent_energy(parent)[source]¶

Get the path into which to write the NEB parent energy. For VASP, the paths are the 00 and 0(N+1) directories, where N is the number of images. Args:

parent (if integer) <int>: 1 for initial endpoint; 2 for
final endpoint
parent (if string) <str>: destination folder specified as
a string, e.g. “03”
is_complete()[source]¶

Check if all images in a VASP NEB calculation are complete.

is_ready_to_run()[source]¶

Check if single VASP NEB ingredient is ready to run.

is_started()[source]¶

See if the ingredient has been started on the queue.

set_up_neb_folders(image_structures)[source]¶

Set up NEB folders. Args:

image_structures <list of Structure>: List
of image structures
set_up_program_input()[source]¶
